statements: SELECT * FROM leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM leaderboard ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM leaderboard WHERE rank IS NOT NULL ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE rank < 10 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT player_name, rank, score FROM leaderboard WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_name AS name, score * 100 AS new_score FROM leaderboard WHERE rank IS NULL;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM leaderboard;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard_scores;
SELECT player_id, score FROM leaderboard_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard_scores WHERE level_completed = TRUE;
SELECT player_id, rank, games_played FROM player_rankings WHERE rank <= 10;
SELECT player_id, score FROM leaderboard_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT player_id, score, level_completed FROM leaderboard_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC, player_id ASC
SELECT player_id, rank FROM player_rankings WHERE games_played >= 10 ORDER BY rank ASC, player_id DESC
SELECT player_id, score, level_completed FROM leaderboard_scores WHERE level_completed = TRUE ORDER BY player_id DESC, score ASC
SELECT player_id, rank FROM player_rankings WHERE games_played < 5 AND rank > 3 ORDER BY rank ASC, player_id ASC
SELECT player_id, score, level_completed FROM leaderboard_scores WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY player_id ASC, score DESC
SELECT player_id, score FROM scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT player_name, score FROM players INNER JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC
SELECT ranking_position, player_id FROM rankings WHERE ranking_position <= 10
SELECT player_name, score FROM players p JOIN scores s ON p.player_id = s.player_id WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT p.player_name, r.ranking_position FROM players p LEFT JOIN rankings r ON p.player_id = r.player_id ORDER BY r.ranking_position
SELECT player_name, ranking_position FROM players p JOIN rankings r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE ranking_position < 5 ORDER BY ranking_position

SELECT player_name, score, ranking_position FROM players p JOIN scores s ON p.player_id = s.player_id JOIN rankings r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE score > 50 ORDER BY score DESC, ranking_position ASC
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100
SELECT * FROM player ORDER BY player_name DESC
SELECT game_name, release_date FROM game WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_name, rank FROM player JOIN ranking ON player.player_id = ranking.player_id WHERE rank <= 3
SELECT * FROM leaderboard ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, game_name, release_date FROM player p JOIN ranking r ON p.player_id = r.player_id JOIN game g ON r.game_id = g.game_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) as total_games_played FROM ranking GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_games_played > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_name, rank FROM player JOIN ranking ON player.player_id = ranking.player_id JOIN game ON ranking.game_id = game.game_id WHERE rank < 3;
SELECT player_name, MAX(score) as high_score FROM leaderboard GROUP BY player_name ORDER BY high_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM player_scores;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT game_name, count(*) as total_players FROM games INNER JOIN player_scores ON games.game_id = player_scores.game_id GROUP BY game_name;
SELECT player_name, game_name, achievement_name FROM players p INNER JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id INNER JOIN games g ON a.game_id = g.game_id ORDER BY player_name, game_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM players p INNER JOIN rankings r ON p.player_id = r.player_id WHERE rank <= 3 ORDER BY rank;
SELECT player_name, AVG(score) as average_score FROM players p INNER JOIN player_scores ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING AVG(score) > 50;
